Articles.Content:
If you don't have a pod attached a lot of the parts are just considered debris and KSP planetary surfaces eat debris.

It was attached to a pod
still love this thing!

still love this thing!

Thread bump needed. Here we go.
For the decoration bits to go inside, how about some repair shop equipment like milling machines and metal lathes?
hmm how about having the original circular tubes to be more space station oriented and the square tubes more base oriented
Tubes! -Large Storage is not possible to open in VAB (it is possible to open when launched thou) so I cannot prestore any parts... any idea how to fix it?

Tubes! -Large Storage is not possible to open in VAB (it is possible to open when launched thou) so I cannot prestore any parts... any idea how to fix it?

It is normally possible to do that, I suspect a conflict with another mod you are using. If you could isolate the conflict, or at least post a list of what mods you have installed, it would help.

Tubes! -Large Storage is not possible to open in VAB (it is possible to open when launched thou) so I cannot prestore any parts... any idea how to fix it?

you probably have two KAS plugins installed at the same time, just delete one and it will work

you probably have two KAS plugins installed at the same time, just delete one and it will work

Yup, and I solved it even before I made that post but didnt rechecked that issue, sorry. Now it works as expected! Thanks.
hmm is this mod still alive? Because onkelsiebdruck hasn't updated this since november and this is too awesome for to let die
is this mod dead?
Hmm I looked on his youtube account and there's a growing habitat part, is there anyway i can get this?

is this mod dead?

I hope it isn't because wait... its only been three days since the last post WHAT RAAH WHY ARE THESE DAYS SO LONG RAAH

also back to the reason for this post, I hope this isn't dead because this still has such awesome potential to be an truly epic mod that will be loved by [insert number here as the real number of people who play KSP is to my knowledge] and becomes legendary among mods

Hello everybody.

IÃ‚Â´m sorry I let you alone in the dark with a unfinished mod. I had absolutely no time for KSP , but ok I will transfer all backup-dev stuff from a virtual-machine-container to an new workstation. Have to Install Unity again...and oh yes i have to install KSP itself. I hope there is at least one update....maybe the collision-system is better now.

First I will try some very simple tubes in different sizes....I hope there is a way for inside-walking + relative small structures.

Hello everybody.

Have to Install Unity again...and oh yes i have to install KSP itself. I hope there is at least one update....maybe the collision-system is better now.

YAY he's back *throws confetti into the air* *dances hysterically*

These parts looks good, how can I missed this thread before ?

@onkelsiebdruck: Any plan to complete the set ?

These parts are brilliant.

Been looking for something like this for a long time.

Hope this is kept up. Would pay for this in release version. =)
This could be a marvelous possibility to get a nice outpost base modules which is of really high demand at the moment.

OK. Tested this all out and think it is good. Just seriously bad issues with some attachment nodes.

Still think it is a brilliant concept.

Hello everybody.

WAhooo!

(is there any chance I can get that growing tube you made in your youtube video? The "more space" one?)

Don't worry about it we're all glad you are back!

OK. Tested this all out and think it is good. Just seriously bad issues with some attachment nodes.

Still think it is a brilliant concept.

Aim for the target. You will also need to exit the area and reload physics.
so hows it going? mods still great
I'll be keepin a close eye on this mod.

I'll be keepin a close eye on this mod.

just hope its still alive like i am
hmm am i the only one that noticed that the newer tubes are harder to use as parts for space stations while the older parts are easier?
